Title: The Day the Stoneheads Came
Description:
What? Want scary story?

You ask. Granny Scribbles give what want. Maybe then sit still like good tenderfoots.

Scariest story Granny know, yes. Story about the day the stoneheads came...
CompletionText: Hope story not too scary for you.
RewardText:
<Granny Scribbles gestures around to the room.>

Not all stoneheads bad, seems like.

Still, little kobold need know what happen. What can happen.

Objectives.Text: Ask Granny Scribbles about the Day the Stoneheads Came
